text.0: agni is priest the great high priest of sacrifice most swift in act.
text.1: he knows the rite in constant course.
text.2: oblationbearer deathless well inclined an eager messenger.
text.3: agni comes nigh us with the thought.
text.4: ensign of sacrifice from of old agni well knoweth with his thought.
text.5: to prosper this mans aim and hope.
text.6: agni illustrious from old time the son of strength who knows all life.
text.7: the gods have made to their priest.
text.8: infallible is agni he who goes before the tribes of men.
text.9: a chariot swift and ever new.
text.10: strength of the gods which none may harm subduing all his enemies.
text.12: by offering sacred food to him the mortal worshipper obtains.
text.13: a home from him whose light makes pure.
text.14: from agni by our hymns may we gain all things that bring happiness.
text.15: singers of him who knows all life.
text.16: o agni in our deeds of might may we obtain all precious things.
text.17: tle gods are centred all in thee.
